src:
Jalan di Sekitar Tiang Listrik Jakut Tergenang Air, Kartini Tewas Kesetrum
06 Nov 2019, 08:06 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Malang nian nasib Kartini (34) yang ditemukan tewas di jalanan, wilayah Cilincing, Jakarta Utara. Kartini tewas diduga kesetrum ketika melewati jalanan sekitar tiang listrik yang tergenang air.
"Iya benar (ada korban tewas). Kondisinya hujan besar, lagi ada genangan air sekitar tiang listrik dan korban lewat situ," ujar Kapolres Jakarta Utara Kombes Budhi Herdi Susianto, ketika dikonfirmasi, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Peristiwa itu terjadi Selasa (5/11) pukul 19.30 WIB, tepatnya di Jl. Madya Kebantenan, Cilincing, Jakarta Utara. Budhi mengatakan korban sudah diperingatkan oleh temannya untuk tidak berjalan di sekitar tiang listrik.
"Oleh temannya sudah diingatkan untuk jalan agak ke tengah mengingat di sekitar lokasi tiang listrik tergenang oleh air hujan," ujarnya.
Namun, menurut Budhi, korban mengabaikan peringatan itu. Tak lama, korban kemudian teriak dan terlempar sekitar 1 meter.
"Karena hujan cukup lebat korban tidak mendengar peringatan saksi. Tidak berselang lama korban terjatuh sekitar 1 meter dari tiang listrik dan oleh saksi dua sempat hendak di tolong namun warga tersetrum juga lalu korban dilepaskan dan meminta bantuan kepada PPSU," katanya.
Selanjutnya, korban dievakuasi ke Rumah Sakit Umum Kecamatan Cilincing. Namun, naasnya nyawanya tidak tertolong.
"Nyawanya tidak tertolong lagi, akhirnya korban kami bawa ke RS Polri untuk dilakukan pemeriksaan lebih lanjut," tutur Budi.

(eva/aan)
text:
Roads around the North Jakarta Electric Pole Flooded, Kartini Killed Electrum
Nov 6, 2019, 08:06 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Malang, the fate of Kartini (34) who was found dead in the streets, Cilincing, North Jakarta. Kartini died suspected of being electrocuted while passing through a street around a waterlogged electric pole.
"Yes, it is true (there is a death toll). The conditions are heavy rain, again there is a pool of water around the electricity pole and the victim through it," said North Jakarta Police Chief Commissioner Budhi Herdi Susianto, when confirmed, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
The incident occurred Tuesday (5/11) at 19.30 WIB, precisely on Jl. Madya Kebantenan, Cilincing, North Jakarta. Budhi said the victim had been warned by his friend not to walk around the electricity pole.
"By his friend he was reminded to walk a bit to the middle of remembering that around the location of the electricity poles were flooded by rain," he said.
However, according to Budhi, the victim ignored the warning. Soon, the victim then screamed and thrown about 1 meter.
"Because the rain was quite heavy the victim did not hear the witness's warning. Not long after the victim fell about 1 meter from the electricity pole and the witnesses were about to be helped but the residents were shocked and the victim was released and asked for help from PPSU," he said.
Subsequently, the victim was evacuated to Cilincing District General Hospital. However, the fate of his life was beyond help.
"His life was not helped anymore, finally our victims were taken to the National Police Hospital for further examination," said Budi.

(eva / aan)
